Articles.Content: There used to be a ton of mods that replaced Kerbol with a black hole and added a ton of extra star systems but I can't find any that work with 1.3. Are there any such mods?

Old planet packs work fine in 1.3 provided you have Kopernicus (and visual packs like EVE or AVP, if required) upgraded to work in the latest version.

I'm currently running a 1.3 career with OPM and Interstellar Adventures installed. No problems to report
